This function calculates the center of a rectangle given a rectangle.

Returns:
A Point with x and y of the center.

Point3f CvUtils::get_rect_centre_3d ( Rect  rect,
Mat  depth_image 
)

This function calculates the center of a rectangle given the rectangle and depth information.

Returns:
A Point3f with x, y and z coordinates of the center.
Parameters:
rect A Rect with x and y coordinates of the upper left corner, height and width.
depth_image A Mat where each pixel gives us depth information.
Mat CvUtils::preprocessing ( Mat  image  ) 

This function fills the regions where the image values are equal to zero.

Returns:
An image without zero values.
Parameters:
image A Mat containing an image.
Mat CvUtils::rgb2bw ( Mat  im_rgb  ) 

This function computes the binary image of a given one by setting to zero all the values smaller than 128.

Returns:
The binary image in im_bw.
Parameters:
im_rgb A Mat containing an image.
Precondition:
The input can be a colour or gray image.
